general.name: axolotl
general.description: sends a random image of an axolotl

general.name: updown
general.description: sends the text back, but upsidedown

image.name: suntzu <text>
image.description: makes a fake Sun Tzu quote

image.name: text <text>
image.description: sends what you say as an image

moderation.name: clear
moderation.description: clears the last 49 messages (yes its exactly 49)

moderation.name: kick <user> <reason>
moderation.description: kicks the specified user from the server

moderation.name: ban <user> <reason>
moderation.description: bans the specified user from the server

moderation.name: unban <userID>
moderation.description: unbans the user specified from their user ID
